title: A Debacle of Donuts
description: After a disappointing result on the scale, Claire decides to go for a walk. Only it winds up being the strangest and darkest walk she's ever had, where paranoia and demons of her self-hate lurk around every corner. It doesn't help that her ankles are raging in agony, her asthma is flaring up, and some kid just threw a rock at her. She's about reached the end of her rope. When she gets an unusual and terrifying opportunity to transform into the person she's always wanted to be, she discovers the conditions are steep. Way steep. How far is she willing to go to shed her own skin?A DEBACLE OF DONUTS asks a question that passes through the minds of millions every single day. Will you like Claire's answer? Read on and find out...
author: Allison M. Dickson
